name: The Road
story: You and your adventuring party are on the road to the next Inn. You see a bandit camp to the side.

name: The Bandit Camp
story: You are at the bandit camp. It's abandoned. You find some gold!
story2: You are at the abandoned bandit camp.

name: The Yawning Portal Inn
story:
The bartender, Yorn, greets you with a hearty "Hello!"
As you approach him, he begins to speak...
"Welcome to the Yawning Portal! You must be interested in exploring the Dungeon of the Mad Mage. I charge 1 gold per person to proceed down the entrance.
You can also visit the shop, or rest in one of the rooms for 5 gold.

name: The Inn Shop
story: "Welcome to my shop!" Announces Bonanz, the shopkeep.

name: The Inn Bedroom
story: You and your party rest for the night. The road has been tiring.

name: The Main Hall
story:
You are in the main hallway. It is cold, quiet, and makes you miss home. 
The floor to the west is relatively clean and well-lit . Some smears and droplets of blood can be seen along the walls and floors.
The eastern hallway is filthy - the stench stings your eyes.
The south hallway seems undisturbed.

name: The West Hall
story: You proceed down the west hallway. You hear echoing laughter down one end. A worn sign labeled "Library" hangs above a door.

name: The Vampire Lair
story:
The hallway remains unchanging as you make your journey. Strangely clean for a dungeon. As you walk down the hallways, the scent of wine and perfume begin to greet you, subtly masking the smell of blood.
Your party approaches a red door, chattering and laughter can be heard from the other side.
"Welcome, adventurers!" 
The door swings open, and a pale, fanged, lanky vampire shouts to greet you.
"How fortunate for you, we have just eaten.
I understand you are probably looking to proceed through the locked door. Well, good news...
I am willing to trade a copy of our key in exchange for a small favour.
If you could retrieve our Idol of Arctivius from that nasty bugbear on this floor, we would be grateful.
story2:
The party makes its way down the hallway, towards the red door.
You approach a red door, chattering and laughter can be heard from the other side.
"Welcome back, adventurers!" 
The door swings open, and a pale, fanged, lanky vampire shouts to greet you.
Were you able to retrieve the Idol? I would be happy to trade the key to you.
story3:
The party makes its way down the hallway, towards the red door.
Behind the door, sounds of celebration can be heard.
It seems your business here has concluded.

name: The Library
story: Your party enters a library.
story2: The library is quiet and uninteresting.

name: The East Hall
story: You are on a dirty, unkept path, littered with skeletons and old equipment. The scent stings your eyes as you take it in.

name: The Goblin Den
story:
You are ambushed by some goblins. Your party is far too experienced to be killed out by such weak foes. 
In a few moments, they are slain, but your party lost 10 health during the battle. You find some gold!
story2: You are in a room littered with the corpses of dead goblins.

name: The Bugbear Lair
story: After several twists and turns, you find yourselves in a large room. A roar deafens your ears as, from the corner, charges a hulking bugbear!'
story2: You find yourselves in an empty room. The body of a freshly killed bugbear lies on the floor.'

name: The Cave
story: You wonder how a cave was dug out in the middle of a dungeon. It's dark and getting tighter with each step further.

name: The Snake Pit
story: You move deeper into the cave.

name: The South Hall
story: A giant oak door stands before you. A keyhole sits in the center.

name: The Statue Room
story:
Your journey continues as the door opens into another section of this floor. It slams shut behind you after a few moments.
The party makes its way through the maze-like halls, eventually finding itself in what looked to be an ancient throneroom.
A 20-foot statue of a Djinn stands tall, blocking the only other exit out of the room.
As your party approaches, braziers shoot up in flames and a booming voice shouts,
"I am the spirit who guards this room"
"None may pass without first passing my test of riddles.
story2: The statue remains still. You can almost feel it watching you, however.

name: The Dark Hallway
story: You are in a dark hallway. Ahead you can see a pack of ghouls patrolling. There is a dark and dusty pathway, a path with some light at the end, and beyond the ghouls, a red door.
story2: You are in a dark hallway. You see no signs of the ghouls.  There is a dark and dusty pathway, a path with some light at the end, and an unguarded red door.
nav2: [2] Sneak past the ghouls, towards the lit hallway
nav3: [3] Sneak past the ghouls along the dark and dusty path
nav4: [4] Try to sneak past the ghouls and enter the door.
nav5: [4] Go through the door while the ghouls are gone

name: The Bazaar
story: You find yourself in a bazaar hosted by goblins. You see a "Gobl-Inn" ahead, perhaps you can rest there. A merchant is calling to you.

name: The Gobl-Inn
story: You pay for a bed and rest up for the night. The accomodations are...lacking, but you manage to sleep.

name: The Lab
story: You find an old lab. Quell conducts a thorough search and finds a potion!
story2: You find yourself in an old, empty lab.

name: The Mage's Chambers
story: As the party rushes into the room, the Mad Mage flies down! Prepare for battle.

name: The Treasure Room
story: You have defeated the Mad Mage and found his treasure! You find a magic carpet and fly off to your next adventure.

name: ghoul ambush
story: Your party was not as stealthy as you thought. The ghouls catch your scent and are immediately upon you. You fought well but were no match for their numbers.

name: The Dark Hallway
story: You are in a dark hallway. You see no signs of the ghouls.
story2: You are in a dark hallway. You see no signs of the ghouls.
nav3: [3] Walk along the dark and dusty path
nav4: [4] Enter the red door while the ghouls are gone.
nav5: [4] Enter the red door while the ghouls are gone.

name: The Goblin's Shop
story: You approach the merchant. "Welcome friends!" a short, green goblin greets you from behind his stand.
